mapper.insert: insert into PACKAGE_CURRENT_STATE (PACKAGE_ID, NODE_ID, TO_NODE_ID, PROCESS_ID, SEND_STATE_DM, OPERATE_STATE_DM, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME) values (#{packageId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nodeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{toNodeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{processId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sendStateDm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operateStateDm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
